🌟 Changemaker’s Connect - Noida Chapter 🌟  

Date: 14th December 2024 | Time: 3:00 PM - 6:00 PM  
Venue: ISDM Campus, Sector 62, Noida  

🎤 Be inspired by stories of change and innovation!  
Join us at Changemaker’s Connect, organized by ISDM in collaboration with Noida Hub,Global Shapers Community to discover how young voices are creating positive social change.  

✨ What’s in store?  
A keynote on leveraging drone technology for sustainability, followed by a panel discussion on empowering youth to create meaningful impact through innovative pathways.

The transformative power of music in driving social change takes center stage with insights from a member of WeBhor, an all-women band that uses melodies and lyrics to advocate for empowerment and inspire positive action.

🤝 Network over High Tea: Meet speakers, changemakers, and peers who share your passion for driving meaningful social impact.  

📢 Who Should Attend?  
Young changemakers aged 21+, including students, early career professionals, and anyone exploring purpose-driven careers.  

💡 Don’t miss this chance to connect, learn, and grow.

Regional Academic Manager - Product Implementation & Training 📚

Britannica Education is seeking a passionate and dynamic individual to join our team as a Regional Academic Manager. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in ensuring seamless product implementation and delivering impactful training sessions for schools.

🌟 Key Responsibilities:
- Lead and manage the end-to-end implementation of Britannica Education products in schools across the assigned region.
- Conduct comprehensive training sessions for educators and school leaders to maximize the value of Britannica’s offerings.
- Retention, renewal and upselling the client via consultative approach 
- Act as a trusted advisor to schools, providing ongoing support and guidance to enhance learning outcomes.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure high-quality service delivery.

👩‍🏫 Ideal Candidate Profile:
 - Strong background in education, with experience in academic training or curriculum implementation.
- Exceptional communication and presentation skills.
- Ability to manage multiple projects effectively and build strong relationships with school stakeholders.
- Passionate about leveraging technology and innovative resources to improve education.

Why Join Britannica Education?
At Britannica Education, we’re dedicated to empowering educators and inspiring learners. Join our mission to make knowledge accessible and impactful for schools around the world.

📍 Location:
North – Lucknow
West – Bhopal/Indore, Pune/Mumbai
South – Hyderabad, Chennai/Kochi
East - Kolkata
